# qbgbaApp <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of qbgbaApp is the analysis of data from the yearly reports of German hospitals as published by the "Gemeinsamer Bundesausschuss" (GBA).

## Installation

You can install the released version of qbgbaApp from [Gitlab](https://gitlab.com/klinik-db/qbgbaApp) with:

``` r
remotes::install_.packages_gitlab("qbgbaApp")
```

## Run it 

It a `golem`-based shiny app, therefore, you can just start it (if `shiny` is installed):

```{r eval = FALSE}
qbgbaApp::run_app()

```
